oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Teardrops On The Roses - George Morgan Performance; Roses - George Morgan performance
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of Teardrops On The Roses, written by Ken Carson and Johnny Lange, produced by Don Law and Frank Jones, published by Lange John Music Co., and performed by George Morgan (vocal), Harold Bradley (guitar), Ray Edenton (guitar), Curtis Gibson (guitar), Grady Martin (guitar), Samuel Pruett (guitar), Little Roy Wiggins (steel), Joseph Zinkan (bass), Buddy Harman (drums), and Fred Shumate (piano). Recorded on January 26, 1965 at Columbia Recording Studio, Nashville, TN. Performance of Roses, written by Tim Spencer and Glenn Spencer, produced by Don Law and Frank Jones, published by Gaviota Music Inc. and Unichappell Music Inc., and performed by George Morgan (vocal), Harold Bradley (guitar), Samuel Pruett (guitar), Curtis Gibson (guitar), Grady Martin (guitar), Little Roy Wiggins (steel), Joseph Zinkan (bass), Buddy Harman (drums), and Fred Shumate (piano). Recorded on January 27, 1965 at Columbia Recording Studio, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: George Morgan
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) George Morgan performs "Teardrops On The Roses" / (2:48) George Morgan performs "Roses"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Morgan, George, 1925-1975; Law, Donald F., 1902-1982; Jones, Frank, 1928-2005;
